alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 5:46AM CDT until September 08 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN FRANKLIN...CRAWFORD AND NORTHEASTERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 546 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Fern to 2 miles northwest of Dyer to 3 miles west of Alma, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Van Buren... Ozark... Charleston... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Alma... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Chester... Rudy... Lee Creek... Bloomer... Lake Fort Smith... Figure Five... Fern... Kibler... Concord... Jethro... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 6 and 36. Interstate 540 near mile marker 1. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
